title: Help from above
title_cn: 上面的帮助

title: In the footsteps of biotech
title_cn: 在生物技术的脚步

title: Our choice from the recent literature
title_cn: 我们从最近的文献中选择

title: A romance with many dimensions
title_cn: 多层面的浪漫

title: Dissected with electrons
title_cn: 用电子解剖

title: Nanowires have cells in their sights
title_cn: 纳米线视线中有细胞

title: The third plasmonic revolution
title_cn: 第三次等离激元革命

title: Nanowires find their place
title_cn: 纳米线找到了自己的位置

title: Plasmonics gets transformed
title_cn: 等离子技术得到转变

title: Graphene transistors
title_cn: 石墨烯晶体管
abstract: Graphene has changed from being the exclusive domain of condensed-matter physicists to being explored by those in the electron-device community. In particular, graphene-based transistors have developed rapidly and are now considered an option for post-silicon electronics. However, many details about the potential performance of graphene transistors in real applications remain unclear. Here I review the properties of graphene that are relevant to electron devices, discuss the trade-offs among these properties and examine their effects on the performance of graphene transistors in both logic and radiofrequency applications. I conclude that the excellent mobility of graphene may not, as is often assumed, be its most compelling feature from a device perspective. Rather, it may be the possibility of making devices with channels that are extremely thin that will allow graphene field-effect transistors to be scaled to shorter channel lengths and higher speeds without encountering the adverse short-channel effects that restrict the performance of existing devices. Outstanding challenges for graphene transistors include opening a sizeable and well-defined bandgap in graphene, making large-area graphene transistors that operate in the current-saturation regime and fabricating graphene nanoribbons with well-defined widths and clean edges.
abstract_cn: 石墨烯已经从凝聚态物理学家的专有领域转变为电子设备领域的人们所探索的领域。特别地，基于石墨烯的晶体管发展迅速，现在被认为是后硅电子产品的一种选择。然而，关于石墨烯晶体管在实际应用中的潜在性能的许多细节仍不清楚。在这里，我回顾了与电子器件相关的石墨烯特性，讨论了这些特性之间的取舍，并考察了它们在逻辑和射频应用中对石墨烯晶体管性能的影响。我得出的结论是，从设备角度来看，石墨烯的出色迁移率可能不是其最引人注目的特征，这通常被认为是。而是，制造具有极薄沟道的器件的可能性是可能的，这将允许石墨烯场效应晶体管被缩放到更短的沟道长度和更高的速度，而不会遇到限制现有器件性能的不利的短沟道效应。石墨烯晶体管面临的严峻挑战包括在石墨烯中打开相当大且定义明确的带隙，制造可在电流饱和状态下工作的大面积石墨烯晶体管以及制造具有明确定义的宽度和干净边缘的石墨烯纳米带。

title: Thermal infrared emission from biased graphene
title_cn: 偏置石墨烯的红外热辐射
abstract: The high carrier mobility and thermal conductivity of graphene make it a candidate material for future high-speed electronic devices. Although the thermal behaviour of high-speed devices can limit their performance, the thermal properties of graphene devices remain incompletely understood. Here, we show that spatially resolved thermal radiation from biased graphene transistors can be used to extract the temperature distribution, carrier densities and spatial location of the Dirac point in the graphene channel. The graphene exhibits a temperature maximum with a location that can be controlled by the gate voltage. Stationary hot spots are also observed. Infrared emission represents a convenient and non-invasive characterization tool for graphene devices.
abstract_cn: 石墨烯的高载流子迁移率和导热性使其成为未来高速电子设备的候选材料。 尽管高速设备的热性能可能会限制其性能，但对石墨烯设备的热性能仍未完全了解。 在这里，我们显示了来自偏置石墨烯晶体管的空间分辨热辐射可用于提取石墨烯通道中狄拉克点的温度分布，载流子密度和空间位置。 石墨烯表现出最高温度，其最高温度可由栅极电压控制。 还观察到固定的热点。 红外发射代表了一种方便且无创的石墨烯器件表征工具。

title: Spectroscopy of few-electron single-crystal silicon quantum dots
title_cn: 少数电子单晶硅量子点的光谱学
abstract: A defining feature of modern CMOS devices and almost all quantum semiconductor devices is the use of many different materials. For example, although electrical conduction often occurs in single-crystal semiconductors, gates are frequently made of metals and dielectrics are commonly amorphous. Such devices have demonstrated remarkable improvements in performance over recent decades, but the heterogeneous nature of these devices can lead to defects at the interfaces between the different materials, which is a disadvantage for applications in spintronics and quantum information processing. Here we report the fabrication of a few-electron quantum dot in single-crystal silicon that does not contain any heterogeneous interfaces. The quantum dot is defined by atomically abrupt changes in the density of phosphorus dopant atoms, and the resulting confinement produces novel effects associated with energy splitting between the conduction band valleys. These single-crystal devices offer the opportunity to study how very sharp, atomic-scale confinement—which will become increasingly important for both classical and quantum devices—influences the operation and performance of devices.
abstract_cn: 现代CMOS器件和几乎所有量子半导体器件的一个定义特征是使用许多不同的材料。例如，尽管在单晶半导体中经常发生导电，但是栅极通常由金属制成并且电介质通常是非晶的。在过去的几十年中，此类设备的性能已得到显着改善，但是这些设备的异质性可能导致不同材料之间的界面处出现缺陷，这对于自旋电子学和量子信息处理中的应用是不利的。在这里，我们报告了在单晶硅中不包含任何异质界面的少数电子量子点的制造。量子点是由磷掺杂原子密度的原子突变而定义的，所产生的限制产生了与导带波谷之间的能量分裂相关的新效应。这些单晶器件提供了机会来研究非常尖锐的原子级限制，这对于经典和量子器件都将变得越来越重要，从而影响器件的操作和性能。

title: Direct imaging of single metal atoms and clusters in the pores of dealuminated HY zeolite
title_cn: 脱铝HY沸石孔中单个金属原子和团簇的直接成像
abstract: Zeolites are aluminosilicate materials that contain regular three-dimensional arrays of molecular-scale pores, and they can act as hosts for catalytically active metal clusters. The catalytic properties of such zeolites depend on the sizes and shapes of the clusters, and also on the location of the clusters within the pores. Transmission electron microscopy has been used to image single atoms and nanoclusters on surfaces, but the damage caused by the electron beam has made it difficult to image zeolites. Here, we show that aberration-corrected scanning transmission electron microscopy can be used to determine the locations of individual metal atoms and nanoclusters within the pores of a zeolite. We imaged the active sites of iridium catalysts anchored in dealuminated HY zeolite crystals, determined their locations and approximate distance from the crystal surface, and deduced a possible cluster formation mechanism.
abstract_cn: 沸石是一种铝硅酸盐材料，包含规则的三维尺度的分子尺度孔阵列，它们可以充当催化活性金属簇的主体。 这种沸石的催化性能取决于团簇的尺寸和形状，并且还取决于团簇在孔内的位置。 透射电子显微镜已用于对表面上的单个原子和纳米团簇成像，但是电子束造成的损坏使其难以对沸石成像。 在这里，我们表明，像差校正扫描透射电子显微镜可用于确定单个金属原子和纳米团簇在沸石孔中的位置。 我们对固定在脱铝的HY沸石晶体中的铱催化剂的活性位点进行了成像，确定了它们的位置和与晶体表面的近似距离，并推断出可能的团簇形成机理。</ p>

title: Mimicking the colourful wing scale structure of the Papilio blumei butterfly
title_cn: 模仿凤蝶蝴蝶的彩色翅膀鳞片结构
abstract: The brightest and most vivid colours in nature arise from the interaction of light with surfaces that exhibit periodic structure on the micro- and nanoscale. In the wings of butterflies, for example, a combination of multilayer interference, optical gratings, photonic crystals and other optical structures gives rise to complex colour mixing. Although the physics of structural colours is well understood, it remains a challenge to create artificial replicas of natural photonic structures. Here we use a combination of layer deposition techniques, including colloidal self-assembly, sputtering and atomic layer deposition, to fabricate photonic structures that mimic the colour mixing effect found on the wings of the Indonesian butterfly Papilio blumei. We also show that a conceptual variation to the natural structure leads to enhanced optical properties. Our approach offers improved efficiency, versatility and scalability compared with previous approaches.
abstract_cn: 自然界中最明亮，最鲜艳的色彩是光与在微米和纳米级呈周期性结构的表面相互作用产生的。 例如，在蝴蝶的翅膀中，多层干涉，光栅，光子晶体和其他光学结构的结合会导致复杂的色彩混合。 尽管已经很好地理解了结构色的物理原理，但是创建天然光子结构的人工复制品仍然是一个挑战。 在这里，我们结合了层沉积技术，包括胶体自组装，溅射和原子层沉积，来制造光子结构，以模仿印度尼西亚蝴蝶凤蝶翅膀上发现的混色效果。 我们还表明，自然结构的概念变异导致增强的光学性能。 与以前的方法相比，我们的方法提供了更高的效率，多功能性和可伸缩性。

title: Large oscillations of the magnetoresistance in nanopatterned high-temperature superconducting films
title_cn: 纳米高温超导薄膜中磁阻的大振荡
abstract: Measurements on nanoscale structures constructed from high-temperature superconductors are expected to shed light on the origin of superconductivity in these materials. To date, loops made from these compounds have had sizes of the order of hundreds of nanometres8–11. Here, we report the results of measurements on loops of La1.84Sr0.16CuO4, a high-temperature superconductor that loses its resistance to electric currents when cooled below ∼38 K, with dimensions down to tens of nanometres. We observe oscillations in the resistance of the loops as a function of the magnetic flux through the loops. The oscillations have a period of h/2e, and their amplitude is much larger than the amplitude of the resistance oscillations expected from the Little–Parks effect. Moreover, unlike Little–Parks oscillations, which are caused by periodic changes in the superconducting transition temperature, the oscillations we observe are caused by periodic changes in the interaction between thermally excited moving vortices and the oscillating persistent current induced in the loops. However, despite the enhanced amplitude of these oscillations, we have not detected oscillations with a period of h/e, as recently predicted for nanoscale loops of superconductors with d-wave symmetry, or with a period of h/4e, as predicted for superconductors that exhibit stripes.
abstract_cn: 由高温超导体构造的纳米级结构的测量有望揭示这些材料中超导电性的起源。迄今为止，由这些化合物制成的环的尺寸约为数百纳米 8＆＃8211; 11 。在这里，我们报告了La 1.84 Sr 0.16 CuO 4 （一种失去电抗性的高温超导体）的回路的测量结果。冷却至＆＃8764; 38 K以下时的电流，尺寸低至数十纳米。我们观察到回路电阻的振荡是通过回路的磁通量的函数。振荡的周期为h / 2e，其幅度远大于Little＆＃8211; Parks效应所预期的电阻振荡的幅度。而且，不像Little＆＃8211; Parks振荡是由超导转变温度的周期性变化引起的，我们观察到的振荡是由热激发运动涡旋和环路中感应的持续振荡电流之间的相互作用的周期性变化引起的。然而，尽管这些振荡的幅度增加了，但我们尚未检测到具有h / e周期的振荡，如最近对具有d波对称性的超导体的纳米级回路所预测的，或具有h / 4e周期的振荡，如针对超导体所预测的那样出现条纹。

title: Self-assembly of three-dimensional prestressed tensegrity structures from DNA
title_cn: DNA三维预应力张紧结构的自组装
abstract: Tensegrity, or tensional integrity, is a property of a structure indicating a reliance on a balance between components that are either in pure compression or pure tension for stability. Tensegrity structures exhibit extremely high strength-to-weight ratios and great resilience, and are therefore widely used in engineering, robotics and architecture. Here, we report nanoscale, prestressed, three-dimensional tensegrity structures in which rigid bundles of DNA double helices resist compressive forces exerted by segments of single-stranded DNA that act as tension-bearing cables. Our DNA tensegrity structures can self-assemble against forces up to 14 pN, which is twice the stall force of powerful molecular motors such as kinesin or myosin. The forces generated by this molecular prestressing mechanism can be used to bend the DNA bundles or to actuate the entire structure through enzymatic cleavage at specific sites. In addition to being building blocks for nanostructures, tensile structural elements made of single-stranded DNA could be used to study molecular forces, cellular mechanotransduction and other fundamental biological processes.
abstract_cn: 张力或拉伸完整性是一种结构的性质，表明依赖于处于纯压缩或纯拉伸状态的组件之间的平衡以保持稳定性。张力结构表现出极高的强度重量比和出色的回弹力，因此被广泛用于工程，机器人技术和建筑领域。在这里，我们报告纳米级，预应力，三维张力结构，其中DNA双螺旋的刚性束抵抗由单链DNA片段作为张力电缆施加的压缩力。我们的DNA张力结构可以抵抗高达14 pN的力进行自我组装，这是强大的分子动力（如驱动蛋白或肌球蛋白）的失速力的两倍。这种分子预应力机制产生的力可用于弯曲DNA束或通过在特定位点进行酶促切割来激活整个结构。由单链DNA制成的拉伸结构元件不仅可以作为纳米结构的组成部分，还可以用于研究分子力，细胞机械转导和其他基本生物学过程。</ p>

title: High-yield self-limiting single-nanowire assembly with dielectrophoresis
title_cn: 介电电泳高产自限单纳米线组件
abstract: Single-crystal nanowire transistors and other nanowire-based devices could have applications in large-area and flexible electronics if conventional top-down fabrication techniques can be integrated with high-precision bottom-up nanowire assembly. Here, we extend dielectrophoretic nanowire assembly to achieve a 98.5% yield of single nanowires assembled over 16,000 patterned electrode sites with submicrometre alignment precision. The balancing of surface, hydrodynamic and dielectrophoretic forces makes the self-assembly process controllable, and a hydrodynamic force component makes it self-limiting. Our approach represents a methodology to quantify nanowire assembly, and makes single nanowire assembly possible over an area limited only by the ability to reproduce process conditions uniformly.
abstract_cn: 如果传统的自上而下的制造技术可以与高精度的自下而上的纳米线组件集成在一起，则单晶纳米线晶体管和其他基于纳米线的设备可能会在大面积和柔性电子产品中得到应用。 在这里，我们扩展了介电泳纳米线的组装，以亚微米对准精度在16,000个图案化电极位点上组装的单纳米线的产率达到了98.5％。 表面力，流体动力和介电泳力的平衡使自组装过程可控，而流体动力分力使其具有自限性。 我们的方法代表了一种量化纳米线组装的方法，并使单个纳米线组装在仅受均匀地复制工艺条件的能力限制的区域内成为可能。</ p>

title: High-power lithium batteries from functionalized carbon-nanotube electrodes
title_cn: 功能化碳纳米管电极的大功率锂电池
abstract: Energy storage devices that can deliver high powers have many applications, including hybrid vehicles and renewable energy. Much research has focused on increasing the power output of lithium batteries by reducing lithium-ion diffusion distances, but outputs remain far below those of electrochemical capacitors and below the levels required for many applications. Here, we report an alternative approach based on the redox reactions of functional groups on the surfaces of carbon nanotubes. Layer-by-layer techniques are used to assemble an electrode that consists of additive-free, densely packed and functionalized multiwalled carbon nanotubes. The electrode, which is several micrometres thick, can store lithium up to a reversible gravimetric capacity of ∼200 mA h g−1electrode while also delivering 100 kW kgelectrode−1 of power and providing lifetimes in excess of thousands of cycles, both of which are comparable to electrochemical capacitor electrodes. A device using the nanotube electrode as the positive electrode and lithium titanium oxide as a negative electrode had a gravimetric energy ∼5 times higher than conventional electrochemical capacitors and power delivery ∼10 times higher than conventional lithium-ion batteries.
abstract_cn: 可以提供高功率的储能设备有许多应用，包括混合动力汽车和可再生能源。许多研究都集中在通过减少锂离子扩散距离来增加锂电池的功率输出上，但是输出仍然远远低于电化学电容器的输出并且低于许多应用所需的水平。在这里，我们报告了基于碳纳米管表面官能团的氧化还原反应的替代方法。逐层技术用于组装由无添加剂，紧密堆积和功能化的多壁碳纳米管组成的电极。该电极厚度为几微米，可以存储锂，其可逆重量为＆＃8764; 200 mA hg ＆＃8722; 1 电极，同时还可以输送100 ＃160; kW＆＃160; kg 电极 ＆＃8722; 1 的功率并提供超过数千次循环的使用寿命，这两个循环都可与电化学电容器电极媲美。使用纳米管电极作为正电极和锂钛氧化物作为负电极的器件的重量能比传统的电化学电容器高5倍，而电力输送则比传统的锂离子电池高10倍。

title: Imaging and quantifying the morphology of an organic–inorganic nanoparticle at the sub-nanometre level
title_cn: 在亚纳米级成像并量化有机-无机纳米粒子的形态
abstract: The development of hybrid organic–inorganic nanoparticles is of interest for applications such as drug delivery, DNA and protein recognition, and medical diagnostics. However, the characterization of such nanoparticles remains a significant challenge due to the heterogeneous nature of these particles. Here, we report the direct visualization and quantification of the organic and inorganic components of a lipid-coated silica particle that contains a smaller semiconductor quantum dot. High-angle annular dark-field scanning transmission electron microscopy combined with electron energy loss spectroscopy was used to determine the thickness and chemical signature of molecular coating layers, the element atomic ratios, and the exact positions of different elements in single nanoparticles. Moreover, the lipid ratio and lipid phase segregation were also quantified.
abstract_cn: 杂化有机无机纳米粒子的开发对于诸如药物递送，DNA和蛋白质识别以及医学诊断等应用很感兴趣。 但是，由于这些纳米颗粒的异质性，其表征仍然是一个重大挑战。 在这里，我们报告了包含较小半导体量子点的脂质包覆二氧化硅颗粒的有机和无机成分的直接可视化和定量。 高角度环形暗场扫描透射电子显微镜结合电子能量损失谱用于确定分子涂层的厚度和化学特征，元素原子比以及单个纳米颗粒中不同元素的确切位置。 此外，还对脂质比率和脂质相分离进行了定量。

title: Subcellular-resolution delivery of a cytokine through precisely manipulated nanowires
title_cn: 通过精确操纵的纳米线亚细胞分辨率的细胞因子传递
abstract: Precise delivery of molecular doses of biologically active chemicals to a pre-specified single cell among many, or a specific subcellular location, is still a largely unmet challenge hampering our understanding of cell biology. Overcoming this could allow unprecedented levels of cell manipulation and targeted intervention. Here, we show that gold nanowires conjugated with a cytokine such as tumour-necrosis factor-alpha can be transported along any prescribed trajectory or orientation using electrophoretic and dielectrophoretic forces to a specific location with subcellular resolution. The nanowire, 6 µm long and 300 nm in diameter, delivered the cytokine and activated canonical nuclear factor-kappaB signalling in a single cell. Combined computational modelling and experimentation indicated that cell stimulation was highly localized to the nanowire vicinity. This targeted delivery method has profound implications for controlling signalling events on the single cell level.
abstract_cn: 在许多或特定的亚细胞位置中，精确地将分子剂量的生物活性化学物质传递到预先指定的单个细胞，仍然是阻碍我们对细胞生物学理解的主要未解决挑战。克服这一点可以实现前所未有的细胞操作和靶向干预水平。在这里，我们显示与细胞因子，例如肿瘤坏死因子-α共轭的金纳米线可以使用电泳和介电泳力沿着任何规定的轨迹或方向运输到具有亚细胞分辨率的特定位置。纳米线长6毫米，直径300纳米，在单个细胞中传递细胞因子和激活的规范核因子kappaB信号。组合的计算模型和实验表明，细胞刺激高度局限在纳米线附近。这种靶向递送方法对于控制单细胞水平的信号事件具有深远的意义。
